headers.subject: ``nlm(.) with derivatives''
headers.x-spam-status: No, score=0.2 required=5.0 tests=BAYES_00,FH_DATE_IS_19XX, MISSING_HEADERS,NO_RECEIVED,NO_RELAYS autolearn=disabled version=3.2.4

quote.quotepara: DougB> This can be expected to run faster when a version of nlm that accepts DougB> gradients and Hessians is available. ---
Doug, do I understand properly that it won't be you who will work on this?

body.para: Like Ross I am spread a little thinly at the moment and I can't in good conscience free up the time to work on this. Sorry but you are correct, I will not be working on this in the near future. -.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.- r-devel mailing list -- Read http://www.ci.tuwien.ac.at/~hornik/R/R-FAQ.html Send "info", "help", or "[un]subscribe" (in the "body", not the subject !) To: r-devel-request@stat.math.ethz.ch _._._._._._._._._._._._._._._._._._._._._._._._._._._._._._._._._._._._._._._._
